name: Belly'em Out!
description:
Belly 'em Out is a game to play with friends, face your opponents and try kickingbellying them out as a sumo fighter in different thematic arenas!

This game was made by:

Gabriel Gattai

Gustavo Hanada

Jhonnatan Christofer Barbosa

Matheus Celeste Gomes

Navarro Farago de Oliveira

Pedro de Toledo Menna Barreto

Vinicius Gonçalves de Almeida

Vinícius Vieira Alves Januzzi
